channel.title: Chill happy hardcore. how on earth do i do this
channel.description: i have listened to this over 20 times and i still don't get it https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bvxvN6r2lDI it confuses me so much if i figured out how to make this style i would be done with 15 of these types of songs

item.title: Chill happy hardcore. how on earth do i do this
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
chill? Sounds like regular happy hardcore to me lol.

Some S3RL stuff sounds like this, you can DL some of his remix packs and see what his melodies look like.

Stonebank literally just had a vid the other day about how he does melodies lol.

https://www.youtube.com/embed/e0RtPWn7H3w
